CustomField.formula: IF( OR(Account.Membership_Code__r.Name = 'CHH', Account.Membership_Code__r.Name = 'Staff Membership', Account.Membership_Code__r.Name = '50 Year Membership', Account.Membership_Code__r.Name = 'Press Card Holder', Account.Membership_Code__r.Name = 'Special Membership'), FALSE, TRUE)
CustomField.label: Can Renew?
